extends IgnitableAdapter

      • getIgnitableShellCommands

        protected abstract Map<Class<? extends Ignitable>,Standalone.StandaloneBuilder> getIgnitableShellCommands()
        Return a map of the available ignitable commands Must be override to point to the actual ignitable commands
        Returns:
        Map using key as ignitable classes and value the standalone builder

      • getCommandList

        protected String getCommandList()
        Return a list of command name available separated by comma (included the standard ones)
        Returns:
        string with a list of available commands separated by comma
        See Also:
        getIgnitableShellCommands()

      • getAvailableCommands

        protected Map<String,BiConsumer<String[],ShellConsole>> getAvailableCommands()
        Return a map with the available commands provided by getIgnitableShellCommands() and the standard commands: help and exit
        Returns:
        map with the command name as key and a biconsumer of arguments and shellConsole as value
        See Also:
        getIgnitableShellCommands()

      • splitCommands

        protected List<String> splitCommands(String[] _arguments)
        Split commands from the given arguments, to do this join all arguments and split per ; separator
        Parameters:
        _arguments - command line argument to shell process
        Returns:
        List of commands (with command name)

      • buildCommand

        protected Optional<CommandExecution> buildCommand(String _command)
        Build a commandExecution for the given command
        Parameters:
        _command - command to execute (with the command name)
        Returns:
        Optional of CommandExecution from the given command
        See Also:
        CommandExecution

      • executeCommand

        protected void executeCommand(Map<String,BiConsumer<String[],ShellConsole>> _availableCommands,
                              String _command)
        Execute the single command provided and given the available commands
        Parameters:
        _availableCommands - commands available for this shell
        _command - command to execute (with the command name)
        Throws:
        UnknownCommand - if the command is unknown

      • batchExecution

        protected void batchExecution(Map<String,BiConsumer<String[],ShellConsole>> _availableCommands,
                              List<String> _commands)
        Start batch execution of the given list of commands with the available commands provided
        Parameters:
        _availableCommands - commands available for this shell
        _commands - list of commands to execute (with the command name)

      • interactiveExecution

        protected void interactiveExecution(Map<String,BiConsumer<String[],ShellConsole>> _availableCommands)

      • startup

        public void startup()
        Description copied from interface: Ignitable
        Override this method to implement the ignitable content. If this instance implements Runnable, then the default implementation will call Runnable::run
        See Also:
        Runnable
